message.body: Hey! I think I have a projector for Saturday - any chance you know of a back up one in case?
You can def use the one in the studio. I would say my house projector but It's screwed into place upside down from the ceiling. Really hard to undo.
Got it - I know the studio projector is 3:4 only right? Or can we use we letterbox it?
It letterboxes naturally, it just puts bars on top and bottom. The resolution is what you really lose
Yr file is 1080 but that projector only does 420
Ok - lets hope for the best with the other projector I am going to borrow.
Just wanting a figure out a back up.
Yes! We should bring the other just in case. No one would probably know the difference but you and I because we knownthe true quality
Totally!
Are you getting to stay home all these crappy weather days?
No!!!
My classes keep missing the cancelations!
Such a bummer. Has leeway closed?
Yeah - today we got the option of working for home - so I am sort of doing that.
Hey - I got an email from mix fest asking if they can use my film to program something for "experiments in cinema festival" in New Mexico! Hopefully that will go through!
Yeahhhh!!! That is so awesome!
I got a no from sxsw - no surprise there - I guess there was over 4000 short submissions!
I thought you had a good chance!!! That's so many submissions. I also heard they are sometimes pretty serious about the premiere status.
Good to know - they actually say they give feedback in April - which is awesome.
Thanks for believing in me!
Oh cool! That's good to know! Haha. I might be biased but the movie is good!
No Way! That's so exciting!
Well just AC
Where?
It's a trailer for a book?
In Brooklyn. Julia asked me to be 1st AC. Yeah apparently that's a thing. It's a new novel. No pictures.
Cool! So julia is working on it too?
Yeah. I don't know much yet.
Sounds like it will be so fun! I am so curious what a trailer for a book looks like
Me too. Haha. Okay gotta go teach. See you Saturday!
Yes! See you then!
